text:
Hello,

In this paragraph:

https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/fr/mod/mod_proxy.html#access

The sentence:

'(en définissant la directive ProxyPass à "off")'

is probably wrong and should be instead:

'(en définissant la directive ProxyRequests à "off")'

ProxyRequests is a link that should point to:

httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/fr/mod/mod_proxy.html#proxyrequests


Thank you very much and Best Regards.

François
creator: francois.tamone@hesge.ch
